TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INameScope

summary.span: 针对如何在特定的 XAML 名称范围内访问元素的名称，以及如何强制该 XAML 名称范围内名称的唯一性，定义一个协定。

span.span: Defines a contract for how names of elements should be accessed within a particular XAML namescope, and how to enforce uniqueness of names within that XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口是由具有用于通过模板重复使用或延迟隐喻的子元素的类实现的。This interface is implemented by classes that have child elements that are intended to be reused through the template or defer metaphor. 模板、 工厂和类似的构造必须具有唯一的 XAML 名称范围的独立于主对象图和根 XAML。Templates, factories and similar constructs must have unique XAML namescopes that are separate from a main object graph and root XAML. 下面的原则是，应会没有名称冲突时创建这些子元素从对象引入到应用程序的对象图，并使 DOM 操作和 XAML 引用技术依赖于名称标识符可将名称每个 XAML 名称范围中的唯一性。The principle here is that there should be no name collisions when objects created from those child elements are introduced to an application's object graph, and so that DOM operations and XAML reference techniques that rely on the name identifier can rely on name uniqueness in each XAML namescope. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此接口存在于 WindowsBase 的特定于 WPF 程序集。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this interface existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 此接口由 WPF 类实现。This interface is implemented by the WPF class . XAML 名称范围中的大多数操作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]通过使用进行操作实例，但信息有时会在内部传达的信息使用的引用。Most XAML namescope operations in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] operate by using instances, but information is occasionally communicated internally by using references. 使用工厂或延迟隐喻结合 XAML 表示形式的 WPF 类的示例包括和。Examples of WPF classes that use a factory or defer metaphor combined with XAML representation are and . 这些实现通常依赖于从可用的接口方法的显式版本类。These implementations usually rely on the explicit versions of the interface methods available from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object FindName(string name) cil managed
Public Function FindName (name As String) As Object

param.name: name
param.span: 发出请求的对象的名称标识符。

span.span: The name identifier for the object being requested.

summary.span: 返回具有提供的标识名称的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that has the provided identifying name.

returns.span: 如果找不到该名称的对象，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if no object of that name was found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XAML 标记中的有效名称字符串必须满足的要求中所述[XamlName 语法](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md)。Valid name strings in XAML markup must match the requirements documented in [XamlName Grammar](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterName (string name, object scopedElement);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterName(string name, object scopedElement) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterName (name As String, scopedElement As Object)
public: void RegisterName(System::String ^ name, System::Object ^ scopedElement);
abstract member RegisterName : string * obj -> unit

param.name: scopedElement
param.span: 提供的 name 所引用的特定元素。

span.span: The specific element that the provided name refers to.

summary.span: 将提供的名称注册到当前的 XAML 名称范围中。

span.span: Registers the provided name into the current XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不允许重复的 XAML 名称范围中的名称。Duplicate names in a XAML namescope are not permitted.

para.span: 不允许重复的名称进行注册。

span.span: Do not permit duplicate names to be registered.

para.span: 如果输入已分配给现有元素的内部集合表示形式的 XAML 名称范围中 (即使它是与相同)，会引发异常。

span.span: If the input is already assigned to an existing element in the internal collection representation of the XAML namescope (even if it is the same as ), throw an exception.

para.span: 此外应考虑引发异常，如果提供的名称不符合[XamlName 语法](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md)。

span.span: Also consider throwing an exception if the provided name does not conform to [XamlName Grammar](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UnregisterName(string name) cil managed

summary.span: 从当前的 XAML 名称范围中注销提供的名称。

span.span: Unregisters the provided name from the current XAML namescope.

para.span: 如果输入的名称不存在，则引发异常。

span.span: If the input name does not exist, throw an exception.

para.span: 您应删除的名称和它引用的集合表示形式的 XAML 名称范围，从以前注册的元素，因此相同的名称可以重新注册在将来。

span.span: You should remove the name and the previously registered element it refers to from the collection representation of the XAML namescope, so that the same name could potentially be registered again in the future.
